mapper.select: select product_code, product_name, category, SUM(o.net_profit) net_profit from (select product_id, SUM((price-cost_price)*quantity) net_profit from tbl_order_product where order_code in (select order_code from tbl_order where order_status = 5) group by product_id) o JOIN tbl_product p on o.product_id = p.product_id group by p.product_code, product_name, category order by net_profit desc;
